body: This is fantastic--I absolutely adore the way the conversation was written!
Pretty wholesome doujin about Kumano. And hot.

@Hanferd True, i actually really like this "Feels" softcore doujinshi, its much better than the usual "OH MY GOD, ITS SO BIG, IM GOING TO GO PREGNANT BY TITS FUCK" It's just pretty dumb ._.
Kahasina is one hell of an artist

p.15, Kumano looked damn hot the way she released her hair as Kumanos character has as serious exterior, shows that she has a wild side of hers. Anyway quite "Tame" for a doujinshi, might not even call this a "Hentai", otherwise this artist has talent for softcore with "Feels". Must keep an eye out for his/her future stuff
